metadata.description: Business Central agentic development tools - skills for AI-assisted AL development

plugins.name: al-build
plugins.description: Build and test AL apps for Business Central. Compiles locally, runs tests on remote Azure VM.

plugins.name: al-object-id-allocator
plugins.description: Allocate the next available Business Central AL object ID/number by scanning .al files and idRanges in app.json.

plugins.name: bc-standard-reference
plugins.description: Locate canonical Business Central Standard behavior (BaseApp, System Application, APIV2, etc.) for events, codeunits, tables, pages, APIs.

plugins.name: refine-issue-for-automated-tests
plugins.description: AL/BC issue refinement workflow for GitHub issues. Produce architecture + automated test plan.

plugins.name: release-notes
plugins.description: Generate release notes from PR analysis.

plugins.name: tdd-implement
plugins.description: Implements AL/Business Central features via TDD after planning is complete.

plugins.name: video-to-issue
plugins.description: Create GitHub issues from Business Central screen recordings.

plugins.name: writing-al-tests
plugins.description: Write, modify, and verify Business Central AL tests with DEBUG telemetry and Red-Green-Refactor.
